H3.text: when did the term sustainability start to be used. 1987

A4.text: The shift in use of 'sustainability' from preservation of forests to broader preservation of environmental resources traces to a 1972 book by Ernst Basler

A5.text: The 1987 Brundtland Report provided a definition of sustainable development
